# frontend/.gitignore

# --- Node.js / npm ---
# The massive node_modules folder. This is the most important rule.
# Dependencies are installed by 'npm install' in the Docker container or CI/CD pipeline.
/node_modules/

# --- Build Output ---
# The compiled application. This is generated by 'npm run build'.
/dist/
.vite/
.next/
/build/

# --- Log files ---
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*

# --- Local Environment Variables ---
# Your .env files contain secrets and should NEVER be committed.
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# --- Editor / OS Specific ---
.idea/
.vscode/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.swp
*~
.DS_Store

# --- Test Artifacts ---
/coverage/
